item.title: Nurburgring logistics
item.description: Spectator points https://nurb-viewpoint.com/en/ General parking (not specific to events) https://oversteer48.com/nurburgring-parking/ Maps General Parkings Parkings (ADAC 24h) Photos Directions and parking Recommendations Nurburgring Nordschleife Walking Map and Photography Locations Other https://radamring.de/en/service-en/arrival-parking/ ADAC 24h' FAQ Fan Guide Fan schedule and shuttle The bus leaves from Hatzenbach, which would be the closest bus stop to parking lot D9. You can’t get to the carousel that way, though; you can only walk there from Br√ºnnchen, but it’s a good uphill and downhill route.
